title: Keyboard Problems
body:
In most games, my keyboard stops working. By this  I mean that my abilities have stopped and most of the time I cannot move. the only key that works is the power button. Because of this, I end up restarting the PC and reconnecting.

Please list some tips or steps to follow to get rid of this problem. 
Thanks.

replies.body: It sounds like this issue isn't necessarily with your keyboard, but with your connection.  Your network might be having trouble connecting to the game server, so you end up standing in place because it can't communicate information.  Our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) would have the best list of tips and steps to get you fixed up.  It can get an overview of your games and find out what's going wrong automatically!  I hope that helps!

I am having the same issue as OP, and I can guarantee it is not my connection. My mouse continues to be responsive during gameplay and all functionality related work as expected. My voice chat continues working flawlessly. As op said, I am also only having this problem in league, and ONLY while in game.
In addition, this problem only occurs when playing League of Legends
